# Unity generated folders and files
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
[Mm]emoryCaptures/
AssetBundles/

# Ignore Unity auto-generated files and folders
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Mm]emoryCaptures/
AssetBundles/

# Ignore PackageCache
Library/PackageCache/


# Autogenerated files by Unity
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
*.pdb
*.opendb
*.VC.db

# Unity3D generated file for VSCode/MonoDevelop project files
.vscode/

# Unity meta files
*.pidb.meta
*.pdb.meta

# Unity folder config
[Uu]ser[Ss]ettings/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Builds
*.apk
*.xcodeproj
*.app
*.exe
*.jar
*.dll
*.class
*.pyc
*.pyo

# Git-specific files
*.orig
*.patch

# Ignore custom Asset Store folders
Assets/AssetStoreTools*
